head.supplied: ¶ [Entomologist views re appt of one. Suggests Prof McAlpine ¶ An additional note in the register states: 'Govt Bot states views as to appt of [an] offr as Govt Entomologist & as to qualifcns of Mr F...

div.p: No. 8006, vol. 1888 K, VPRS 1168/P inward correspondence registers, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Letter not found; item is a register entry only, entered on 17 August 1888.
[Entomologist views re appt of one. Suggests Prof McAlpine
An additional note in the register states: 'Govt Bot states views as to appt of [an] offr as Govt Entomologist & as to qualifcns of Mr French for such appt. Advises that services of Profr McAlpine be secured.'M's letter was forwarded to the Public Service Board on 18 August 1888 minuted: 'Am not aware of recomdns refd to by Govt Botanist'.French wassubsequentlyappointed Government Entolologist, while McAlpine becameVegetable Pathologist.
]
